title: How to Escape from an Implacable Man - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Yandere   Possessive Characters   Thriller
author: Nagano Yuki   長野雪
description:
「I won't let you go anymore, my Mari」

At twelve years old, I, Maritsia, had been adopted (forcibly) by a knight who was clearly good-looking.

I can't stand that guy who was excessively clingy & who continued to be restraining anymore! No matter how many times I get caught, I will escape!>
